RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo On Error Resume Next&echo Set wmi = GetObject("winmgmts:\\.\root\cimv2"^)&echo Set drive = wmi.Get("Win32_DiskDrive.DeviceID='\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0'"^)&echo If Err.Number ^<^> 0 Then)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo Msgbox Err.Description&echo WScript.Quit 1&echo End If&echo If drive.InterfaceType = "IDE" Or drive.InterfaceType = "SCSI" Then&echo WScript.Quit 0&echo Else)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\assert.vbs" (echo MsgBox "Assertion failed."&echo WScript.Quit 1&echo End If)"
cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo SELECT DISK=0&echo CLEAN&echo CONVERT GPT&echo CREATE PARTITION EFI SIZE=300&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=FAT32 LABEL="System"&echo CREATE PARTITION MSR SIZE=16)"

cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo SHRINK MINIMUM=1000&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Windows"&echo CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL="Recovery")"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"
